ComicInfo.Title: All Swords against Them!
ComicInfo.Summary: All Swords against Them!: Thor and his crew return to Asgard to find it populated and ruled by doppelg√§ngers of themselves. Fighting ensues and the truth is revealed. Igron had used his magic to create the impostors in a scheme to elevate his position to Master of Asgard and Lord of the Dark Domain. The true Asgardians triumph just in time to learn of a new approaching menace.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 10:54:21. [CVDB13814] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:18:04. [Issue ID 26900]
